Reviews.Title: very dull picture
Reviews.Author: Texas Slim
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed. MY first plasma and it does not compare well against my old LCD. there are no whites...only shades of gray.  I've tried all the adjustments/tuning but it still does not have bright colors.  The anti-glare feature works well.  Maybe that feature dulls the color?UPDATE:  After multiple 1 hour calls to LG and following their tuning instructions they agreed to send a tech out.  I showed him my 7 year old Sony and compared it to the new LG illustrating the dull picture of the LG.  After he made multiple adjustments he said "that's the way it is".  I wouldn't give you $100 for this LG TV.Another piece of advice:  Don't buy your TV until your ready to mount it.  Not thinking there could be anything wrong with this TV, my installation was delayed past 30 days of my receipt of it so I could not send it back.

Reviews.Title: Kick a** TV period.
Reviews.Author: R. Gellis "rlysmthn"
Reviews.Content: it really comes to life when you go past 200 hours before then it is pretty nice but one it breaks in {like all plasma TV's} this one is really as good as it gets for a plasma,  I have spent at least 100 hours researching including checking at the big box stores and am overjoyed that I got this one,  This TV was panned by the test magazines, but read between the lines, also it has had it's firmware updated as late as December of 2013, mine was an early one in back stock, it took it a few hours to download all of the updates to the op system, that may have been my internet connection, all of the con's have long been corrected and there is extended access to all of the picture controls and in all aspects this is one great TV  I was trepidatious about buying it but have been well rewarded, I got an open box one that was still all wrapped up from my research there is nothing close to it in the price class and many go for more with no advantage remember this was LG's flagship model for 2012 and they don't make bad TV's good for us that want quality at a great price, you could pay more than double and not be as well set
